definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: The destruction of defilement, is what real merit is, the highest merit.
sentences.chinese: 灭除烦恼是真正的，最高的功德。

definition: karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
incantation (Sanskrit: dharani)/religious chant (promoting virtue and obstructing evil)
arhat (Sanskrit)/a holy man who has left behind all earthly desires and concerns and attained nirvana (Buddhism)
to give food (as a charity)/"feeding the hungry ghosts" (Buddhist ceremony)
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
